item.title: Repeated dog fouling, 25th January

item.title: Binmen collecting blue bags at fault, 25th January
item.description:
They remove the bags that are split but leave the contents. This is not acceptable. MP and councillors advised of this. Please instruct the manager of this problem—dog mess and rotten food on a footpath with two primary schools v close (thirty or so paces).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 68a, Goodrich Road, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead tree, 25th January
item.description:
This tree, which appears to be dead, is in a private garden, but overhangs the pavement on WPR. Someone needs to ensure that this tree is safe and does not fall on a person or car. The tree is leaning onto the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wyatt Park Road, Streatham Hill, Greater London

item.title: Missing drain cover, 25th January
item.description:

item.title: Temporary traffic lights near Hayne Road not working, 25th January
item.description:
The temporary traffic lights for road works in Blakeney Road are not working. It is quite a long section of narrow road which has road works where you can't see what is coming in the other direction.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Blakeney Road, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Utility Works and Temporary Traffic Lights

item.title: Graffiti and fly tip in and around the underpass, 25th January
item.description:
I have hit a limit as to how many pictures I can upload. But that whole underpass has a number of different graffiti on it. It’s been there since the new year and the number has progressively increased. As well as graffiti, people regularly fly tip within the underpass and at the entrance. There’s a pram that has been left at the top of the underpass and it’s been there since December last year. Thanks in advance for fixing the problem.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Shooters Hill Road, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet
